commitResults.messageTitle: V1.2: Refactor Parser for "Edit", "Delete", "Find", "Help" and their commands (#74)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Refactor "Help" command and parser

No changes necessary to parser besides changing the link to the
user guide.

* Refactor "Edit": fix imports and usage message in command

* Refactor "Edit": fix imports in parser

* Refactor "Edit": refactor EditRecipeDescriptor

Edit fields and getter / setters for EditRecipeDescriptor to follow new Recipe model

* Refactor "Edit": refactor Recipe model to better use optional types

* Refactor "Edit": fully update command and parser to use Recipe

V1.2: Refactor Parser Classes and their respective Command classes

Parser & Commands:
- Refactor Add, Edit, Delete, Find, List, Clear, Exit, Help
- Add validation for Instruction and Step

Model:
- Refactor getter/setter for optional-typed Portion and Duration fields
- Rename occurrences of AddressBook into RecipeBook
- Refactor Tags, Instructions, and Steps fields in Recipe to not use optional types

commitResults.messageTitle: [WIP] V1.2: Cleanup, Code Style, and Code Quality (#80)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Code Style: Remove asterisk imports

* Misc: Fix minor typos

AddCommand.java
- Mark duration and portion as optional

RecipeDuration.java
- Reword numeric/decimal portion -> section for clarity

RecipePortionInvalidArgumentException.java
- Fix typo in exception string

* Misc: Rename instances of "address" to "recipe" in Parser

* Misc: Rename instances of "address" to "recipe" in Logic

* Misc: Rename instances of "address" to "recipe" in Model

* Misc: Rename remaining instances of "address" to "recipe"

No renaming done to storage/UI module as it is still a work in progress

Some tests are affected due to refactor of variable names

* Misc: Refactor SampleDataUtil to generate sample Recipes

* Misc: Update SampleDataUtil to prevent unchecked casts

* Code Style: Fix minor code style issues

---------

Co-authored-by: Ong Seeu Sim <90857020+SeeuSim@users.noreply.github.com>

commitResults.messageBody: This class is a generic extension of NameContainsKeywordsPredicate. It is a predicate that checks if a property's name match a list of keywords.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor find-by-name feature of FindCommand to use PropertyContainsKeywordPredicate
Implement find-by-tag feature of FindCommand using PropertyCollectionContainsKeywordsPredicate
commitResults.messageBody:
- "Find" now works with recipe tags
- A recipe will be shown as long as any of its tags matches any of the keywords
As lambda instances are created as different objects and have no proper equality testing, FindUtil is introduced to add singletons for various commonly-used functions

commitResults.messageTitle: Change all constructor calls to PropertyNameContainsKeywordsPredicate<Name> to use FindUtil
commitResults.messageBody: All such calls now use the singleton functions defined in FindUtil, so that equality checking works

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename name functions in FindUtil to comply with checkstyle

commitResults.messageBody: Tests are now passing as equality checking of predicates have been fixed.

commitResults.messageBody:
UI Features for V1.3
Features include:
⁃ AddRecipe form + logic for adding through form
⁃ Forms include automatic new rows, keyboard navigation, and prepopulation
⁃ EditRecipe form + logic for editing through form
⁃ Keyboard shortcuts for delete, add, edit, popup, import
⁃ Styling changes of MainWindow, including font, colour and layout changes

Credit to contributors: (so y’all can refer for PPP easier)

Seeu sim for styling changes (fonts) and bug-fixing for form logic (dependency propagation, navigation and misc fixes)
⁃ Alson for implementing import export and offering to help with check style fixes
⁃ Filbert for debugging addcommand and addcommandparser
